mutants.code:
def lengthOfLongestSubstring(s):
    start = 1
    end = 0
    unique_chars = set()
    maxLen = 0
    while end < len(s):
        if s[end] in unique_chars:
            unique_chars.remove(s[start])
            start += 1
        else:
            unique_chars.add(s[end])
            maxLen = max(maxLen, end - start + 1)
            end += 1
    return maxLen
